moduleMetadataJson.name: Brute Force AM/OOK (ie: Garage Doors)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
Post Module for HWBridge RFTranscievers.  Brute forces AM OOK or raw
                               binary signals.  This is a port of the rfpwnon tool by Corey Harding.
                               (https://github.com/exploitagency/github-rfpwnon/blob/master/rfpwnon.py)
author: Craig Smith

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: BINLENGTH
options.description: Binary Length of signal to brute force

options.name: REPEAT
options.description: Number of times to repeat the signal

options.name: PPAD
options.description: Specify your own binary padding before the brute forced binary

options.name: TPAD
options.description: Specify your own binary padding after the brute forced binary

options.name: RAW
options.description: When set, disables PWM encoding. BINLENGTH must be -1

options.name: TRI
options.description: When set, brute foces a trinary signal.
